content.title: Step 3
content.description: Click on 'Get Apps' option.

slides.subtitle: Configured and tested the SAP SuccessFactors app installation on Android devices to ensure secure login, smooth setup, and optimal user access.

content.title: Step 4

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 1
content.description: Pre-Requisites.
extra: Intune requires Android 9.x or higher for device enrollment
Storage – Free space of 8GB Mandatory.
For Intune app protection policies to apply, Intune requires Android 9.0 or higher. Mobile OS details
can be verified in Device Security → System → About
A communication from TCPL IT team that you are eligible for this enrollment.
Remove device from existing enrollment

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 2
content.description: Remove device from Intune Company portal – Device Offboarding.
extra: Note: If your device is not enrolled, skip this activity and move to Step 3. Enroll Android device in Microsoft Intune-Device Onboarding
Open Company portal, click the 3 horizontal bars on the top left corner and select “Remove Company Portal.”

Alternatively, you can navigate to Settings, Search for “Accounts and Sync”, Open it and you will see an option for “Remove work profile. If you select it your work profile will be removed from the device.
Restart the device then.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 3
content.description: Enroll android device in Intune Company Portal – Device Onboarding.
extra: Note: If you do not receive below message, skip this step, and move to next step.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 4
content.description: Enroll android device in Intune Company Portal.
extra: Step 4 (1)
Open Google play store to install company portal app.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 4
content.description: Enroll android device in Intune Company Portal.
extra: Step 4 (2)
Search for Intune Company Portal and click “Install.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 4
content.description: Enroll android device in Intune Company Portal.
extra: Step 4 (3)
Open the Company Portal app and sign in with your work or school account.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 4
content.description: Enroll android device in Intune Company Portal.
extra: Step 4 (4)
Enter your email address and then click “Next” and complete the multi factor authentication.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 4
content.description: Enroll android device in Intune Company Portal.
extra: Step 4 (5)
After successful authentication, the user is prompted to Create Work Profile, activate a work profile, Update the device Settings click on Begin.

Click “Begin” on below screen. Click “Continue” after reviewing what data can be accessed on your phone. It will then register your device to Intune. The Company Portal setup process will take a few minutes to complete.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 4
content.description: Enroll android device in Intune Company Portal.
extra: Step 4 (6)
Click “Accept & Continue”. Then click “Next”.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 4
content.description: Enroll android device in Intune Company Portal.
extra: Step 4 (7)
This will start setting up your work profile. Once it is completed, you will be prompted to click “Next”. Click “Next” on the screen.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 4
content.description: Enroll android device in Intune Company Portal.
extra: Step 4 (8)
Now a work profile has been created, and it must be activated. Click on continue, and this will register the device to Intune and Activate the Work Profile on the device.
Now you need to choose a category for the device. Select the right category out of personal or corporate device and Click “Done”.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 4
content.description: Enroll android device in Intune Company Portal.
extra: Step 4 (9)

If you are using a personal device Select “Personal” or if it is a company provided device then select “Corporate”. Click “Done” as highlighted below. Now a work profile has been created and activated

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 4
content.description: Enroll android device in Intune Company Portal.
extra: Step 4 (10)
Click “continue”, then click “Confirm Device Settings”. This will update the device settings.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 4
content.description: Enroll android device in Intune Company Portal.
extra: Step 4 (11)

Now you will see the 3 checks completed. Click “Done”. The work apps will be separate from personal apps. Work apps will have a badge. You can download Works apps from the badged version of Google Play Store.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 4
content.description: Enroll android device in Intune Company Portal.
extra: Step 4 (12)
You will now see a notification to open badged version of Google Play to get the apps. In Google play store search for “Apps” to see all the available apps.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 4
content.description: Enroll android device in Intune Company Portal.
extra: Step 4 (13)
A work profile will be created which will have contain applications which are already installed on the device as shown below:
You will then receive notifications about applications which are getting installed automatically.
Wait for a few minutes and let them get installed. Then sign-in to applications like Outlook, Teams, Excel.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 5
content.description: Configure Outlook post device Enrollment.
extra: Step 5 (1)
Open Outlook from the list of Work Apps. Click “Add Account”, sign-in using email address and password. Complete the multi factor authentication.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 5
content.description: Configure Outlook post device Enrollment.
extra: Step 5 (2)
You will see a prompt mentioning Your organization protects data in this app. Click “Continue” If you have more accounts to add, you can add them too. Else select “Maybe Later.”

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 6
content.description: Configure Outlook post device Enrollment.
extra: Step 6 (1)
Open Microsoft Teams from the list of Work Apps. Sign-in using work credentials

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 6
content.description: Configure Outlook post device Enrollment.
extra: Step 6 (2)
After signing-in you will see the prompt a prompt “Your organization protects data in this app”. Click “Continue”

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 6
content.description: Configure Outlook post device Enrollment.
extra: Step 6 (3)
Below the screen will appear showing features of Microsoft Teams. Click “Next”

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 6
content.description: Configure Outlook post device Enrollment.
extra: Step 6 (4)
Select “Got it”. Then wait till setup is complete.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 7
content.description: Setup Word and Excel
extra: Open Word or Excel from Work Profile. You will see the prompt mentioning Your organization protects data in this app. Click “Continue.” You will be signed in then.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 8
content.description: Sign-in to Microsoft Edge
extra: Open Microsoft Edge from Work Profile. Click sign-in to Sync, then sign-in using email address and password. You will see a badge when Edge opens-up. If you click on Badge, it will show your work credentials.
Note: If you do not install or sign-in to edge, you will not be able to open web URLs from Outlook and Teams.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 9
content.description: Personal Apps vs Work Apps
extra: Step 9 (1)
One android device, Work apps are marked with a briefcase badge, while personal apps do not have a briefcase badge.

slides.title: Welcome to MDM Enrolment Instructions for iPhone
slides.subtitle: Securely enroll and manage Android devices to ensure data protection, policy compliance, and seamless access within the organization’s MDM system.

content.title: Step 9
content.description: Personal Apps vs Work Apps
extra: Step 9 (2)

After you've set up the work profile, you may see duplicate apps on your device. For example, you could have two Outlook apps. Use the version that's marked with the briefcase whenever you're doing work- related tasks.
